item.title: The Rust Project Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: The Rust Project Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJuly 22, 2025The Rust Projectis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for repositories, packages, and websites maintained by the Rust Project. More details:https://www.rust-lang.org/policies/security#scope.

item.title: Help Shape the Future of CVEs with the CVE Consumer Working Group
item.description: Help Shape the Future of CVEs with the CVE Consumer Working GroupblogBy Jay JacobsfromCVE Consumer Working Group (CWG)external site|July 29, 2025Vulnerability data is part of the foundation of a strong security program. But if you’ve ever tried to work withCVEdata at scale, you know there are opportunities to refine its completeness, accuracy, and timeliness for even greater impact.For those of us cleaning, normalizing, and using CVE Records on a daily basis the challenges may seem obvious. But many of those important insights about what is working and what causes the most pain rarely make it back to theCVE Program.That’s where the “Consumer Working Group (CWG)” comes in.

item.title: Arteche Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Arteche Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsJuly 29, 2025Artecheis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Arteche issues only.

item.title: Mapping the Root Causes of CVEs
item.description: Mapping the Root Causes of CVEspodcastAugust 5, 2025Host Shannon Sabens chats withCVE™/CWE™Project Lead Alec Summers andCWE Top 25task lead/CWE Root Causes Mapping Working Grouplead Connor Mullaly about the importance of mappingCVE Records(vulnerabilities) to their technical root causes usingCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE). Additional topics include the benefits of RCM forCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)and consumers of CVE data,Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)and other vulnerability metadata and their differences with CWE, theCWE Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesseslist, and the tools and guidance available to improve the RCM process (e.g., examples of mappings and best practices on theCWE website, mapping usage labels on CWE entry pages on the website, theRCM WG, and an LLM tool), and more.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 242 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for August 4, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 242 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for August 4, 2025blogBy CVE Program|August 5, 2025

item.title: Legion of the Bouncy Castle Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Legion of the Bouncy Castle Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 5, 2025Legion of the Bouncy Castle Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Legion of the Bouncy Castle issues only.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on July 23 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on July 23 Now AvailablenewsAugust 12, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on July 23, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: NETGEAR Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: NETGEAR Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 12, 2025NETGEARis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in all products from NETGEAR, its subsidiaries, and third-party components used in NETGEAR products that are not in another CNA’s scope.

item.title: Spartans Security Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Spartans Security Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 19, 2025Spartans Securityis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in software, services, and infrastructure owned and managed by Spartans Security, and vulnerabilities researched and found by Spartans Security in third-party products that are not part of another CNA's scope.

item.title: Software.com Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Software.com Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 19, 2025Software.comis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Software.com issues only.
